dt: {bc}February 22 formerly observed as a legal holiday in most of the states of the U.S.
{bc}the third Monday in February observed as a legal holiday in most of the states of the U.S.

shortdef: February 22 formerly observed as a legal holiday in most of the states of the U.S.
the third Monday in February observed as a legal holiday in most of the states of the U.S. —called also Presidents' Day
